QuestData.Title: Fragments of the Past
QuestData.Description: The Order of the Cloud Serpent's history stretches back thousands of years, and although we have tried to preserve the old ways, there are ancient techniques that have been lost over time.$B$BYou can help us recover some of this knowledge by searching Pandaria's dig sites for clues to our past.$B$BUse your archaeology skill to survey around Pandaria and bring me whatever you find.
QuestData.LogDescription: Visit archaeology dig sites around Pandaria and use your survey ability to retrieve 6 Serpentrider Relics.
